channel.title: Alpha Server
channel.description:
So a while back I managed to find a working Alpha 1.2.6 server launcher. I just recently got back into MineCraft (only early alpha-early beta as that's when I started playing and I hate the new version of MineCraft) and I was talking to a find of mine about starting an Alpha 1.2.6 server. We would have all custom-made plugins, etc...
What's ya'll thoughts on this?

item.title: Alpha Server
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

naseem142:

I’d play it too, But the current MC launcher offer all older Minecraft versions, Why would it be hard to find one?

It only offers offline/single player mode. They don’t offer the actual server launcher (MineCraft_Server.jar).

Read full topic

item.title: Alpha Server
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

I’m personally not a huge fan of Minecraft before the 1.1 update.

Read full topic

item.title: Alpha Server
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:2, topic:542415”][quote author=Michael P link=topic=661292.msg4420459#msg4420459 date=1398117955]We would have all custom-made plugins, etc…
[/quote]Ew. No.

I’d definitely play it if it was as Vanilla as possible, maybe with a few other must have features.[/quote]

We would only be adding stuff such as protection on the Nain server towns and maybe a plugin to allow players to trade (player owned shops). Everything else would be normal.

Read full topic
